name: Creepy Bloody Buddies
description:
This game is in Development.

CurrentState:

-singleplayer gameplay
-vr gameplay
-winning 
-no game loop (needs to restart the app to play again)

In the land of -%&$--- there is a legend about a lost world where there’s nothing but fun mischief and mountains of candy for the Bloody Buddies. Our protagonists found the gates to cross into this land, but to get there they must race through a treacherous path, fiercely guarded by the Gruesome Guardian, who won’t let anyone pass. Why is he keeping everyone away from such an exciting land? Only those who make it to the other side will find out.
